title: lumalee
author: lumalee
content: The LumaleeERC20 project seeks to create a secure, reliable and accessible exchange platform for everyone in the world of cryptocurrencies. In this Gitbook, we'll explore their mission, roadmap, and major achievements such as listing on major exchanges, audits, and building an NFT collection. Join us in our quest to transform the financial industry and online transactions. Token name: Lumalee Symbol: LUMA Decimals: 9 Total Supply: 420,000,000,000,000Distribution:  5% Marketing Wallet - 21.000.000.000.000  2% Team Wallet  - 8.400.000.000.000  3% Airdrop when reaching $50M Mcap.  - 12.600.000.000.000 2% CEX LISTING - 8.400.000.000.000  38% Burned  - 159.600.000.000.000 34.91% public presale -  120.000.000.000.000    15.09% liquidity - 63.352.500.000.000  Team vision The vision of the LumaleeERC20 project is to be a market-leading cryptocurrency exchange platform, offering an intuitive user experience and a wide range of advanced features for users of all levels. Our goal is to transform the way people conduct financial transactions online through the use of blockchain technology and the LumaleeERC20 cryptocurrency. We want to create a community of users committed to the success and growth of the platform. https://t.me/LumaleeERC20https://lumaleeerc20.com/https://twitter.com/LumaleeERC20FOR MORE INFORMATION, VISIT OUR TWITTER OR TELEGRAM PAGE

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Welcome to the official bitcointalk forum.The thread here is purely empty and lacking of words to convince the audience and reader about your project as an exchange platform ( No security aspect of the exchange was included, how are users funds being safe) then for a better view i suggest to get a copper member to be able to upload images. I think your website is entirely empty lacking of good designs and information.Wish you Goodluck

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Shouldnt be on the announcement section? OP this should moge on that, also much better if you make it presentable. Add some images, and used ome design as possible. You cant expect some to he interested if the token pitch isnt done with some efforts. If you can avail the copper membership so you could do some high rank privilege like addinh photos.
